long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the OpenSauced chrome extension, you can easily view the repositories and projects a user has contributed to on GitHub and quickly jump to the corresponding pages on the OpenSauced platform. 

You can also ask a repository any question about the code (limited to open source and permissibly licensed repositories).

Overall, the OpenSauced extension is a must-have companion for anyone who is passionate about open-source software and wants to contribute to the community. Whether you're an experienced maintainer or just getting started, this extension makes it easy to discover, contribute to, and track open-source projects on GitHub and connect with other developers who share your interests and skills. So why wait? Download the OpenSauced extension today and start contributing to the open-source community!
